summary: Three college cheerleaders (and after-school go-go dancers) use their martial arts skills to save their Sensei from mafia kidnappers, but must keep their extracurricular activities a secret to realize their Ivy League dreams at Brown.
cast: Trishelle Cannatella|Ginny Weirick|Maitland McConnell|George Takei|Michael Paré|Michael FitzGibbon|Larry Poindexter|Natasha Chang|Omar J. Dorsey|Eric Stonestreet|Richard Davalos|Max Perlich|Jullian Sonteay|Dion DeRizzo|Curtis Jackson|Lateef Crowder|Daniel Ash|Louise Stratten|Rylan Williams|Kirsten Holly Smith|Steve Olson|Matthew Frauman|Anna Lillie|Tom Deters|Heather Vandeven|Hank Grover|Jason Ellis|Jamie Lynn|Robbie Kaller|Joseph Garza|Alexi Yulish|Izabella St. James|Kennedy Heidel|Annie Gonzalez|Megan Moylan|Eleonora Barna|Lily Leo|Dan Olivo|Noel Osborne|Buddy Daniels Friedman|Sergio Ontiverus|Heather Carroll|Gypsy|David E. Brown|Christopher Collard|Brittany Madelynn Daniels|Rico Devereaux|Anthony DiRocco|Mark Casimir Dyniewicz Jr.|Antonii Evan|Garrett Forbes|Hayley Holmes|Beverly Hotsprings|Lu Johnson|Jeffrey Scott Jones|Shane Kaufman|Reuben Langdon|Mirielle Leconte|Ryan Manuel|Brandon McKinnie|Charyse Monet|Mary Pascoe|Eric Reinholt|Mike Wilson
title: Ninja Cheerleaders
